post.content:
public DataTable ReadCsv(string file) {
    string str = $"Provider=Microsoft.Jet.OleDb.4.0;Data Source='{Path.GetDirectoryName(file)}';Extended Properties=Text";
    var dt = new DataTable();
    using (var conn = new OleDbConnection(str))
    using (var da = new OleDbDataAdapter($"select * from [{Path.GetFileName(file)}]", conn)) {
        conn.Open();
        da.Fill(dt);
        return dt;
    }
}

 

private string _prop;
public string Prop {
    get { return _prop; }
    set {
        if (value > 100) {
            _prop = value;
        }
    }
}
